#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    
int array[27] = {0};
char d = 't';
while(true)
{
           
     d = getchar();
     if(isspace(d))
     break;
     array[d-'a'+1] = array[d-'a'+1] +1;        
           
}

cin.clear();
while(true)
{
     d = getchar();
     if(isspace(d))
     break;
     array[d-'a'+1] =0;           
}
int i=1;
do
{
    if(array[i]!=0)
    cout << (char)(i-1+'a') << array[i];
    i++;
}while(i!=27);
             

return 0;    
}
